Reviews.Title: Double Flashes troublesome, but solid budget camera.
Reviews.Author: Nicole H
Reviews.Content: I bought this last year from Walmart for seventy dollars.Pros: 14 mega, 5x zoom, price, fuji, good audio on videos, durableCons: double flashes, doesn't zoom very far in video mode (1080 or 720), doesn't always take the best shotsPersonally, if you can buy a better camera than you should. The thing that really bothers me about the camera is the double flashes - makes for a lot of blinking.

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Wayne A. Miller
Reviews.Content: This camera worked OK somewhat for about 18 months. It does have an Autofocus problem. Not always good, especially in close-up mode. Then the power-up started going into error more and more until it errors every time making the camera totally useless. Now JUNK. Cheap camera. Short life.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Judie
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera around November 2010. I loved it from the beginning and i still LOVE it. It's user friendly, makes good shots (u need to make sure your hands are very stable as u take the pictures). Its very portable and has a really cool housing! Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: bad fuji camera, not worth buying
Reviews.Author: THANKFUL
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT 2 CAMERAS ON NOV 2010 BECAUSE OF ITS PRICE THINKING IT WOULD BE A GOOD CAMERA, SINCE MY EXPERIENCE WITH OUR KODAK WAS A GOOD ONE, I THOUGHT FUJI FILM CAMERA AX250 WOULD FUNCTION PROPERLY, UNFORTUNATELY IT DIDN'T WORK TOO MUCH BEFORE IT BROKE DOWN. IT WON'T TAKE PICTURES. SINCE IT IS UNDER WARRANTY I SENT IT TO BE FIXED, IT ARRIVED TODAY, I REMOVED IT FROM THE BOX AND IT WON'T TAKE ANY PICTURES.SO WE'LL SEE WHAT WILL HAPPEN....IF FUJI FILM WILL TAKE GET IT FIXED?
